body:
Emmm false or someelse but not clearing directory with other files.
Maybe before deleting dir, check if it empty or not?

What is worst is you assume `exec` is available everywhere and you call it at https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/blob/master/framework/helpers/BaseFileHelper.php#L419 
I think the framework should never use these functions. Same goes for `eval` which now should be avoidable.

Well, that's last-last resort measure if anything else didn't work. That's known issue that this is the only way to remove a symlink in non-pro versions of Windows 10 but yes, that's a good idea to check availability first.

issue.title: BaseFileHelper::unlink() returns wrong value

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.title: Closes #15779. Fix `FileHelper::unlink()` for Windows
